EmailTemplate.subject: 6 Reasons Why This Hire Makes Sense
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Win Win For Your Business! An internship program isn’t just about hiring an extra set of hands in the workplace. The right intern can bring a fresh perspective to your business, knowledge of the latest industry trends, tech savviness and much more.
